Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for x86-64) 2015.3 (Build 211U)

XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="SQLRUCube" displayName="SQLRU" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="Forum.Post" countMeasureName="%COUNT" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0" disableListingGroups="false"> <dimension name="Tech" displayName="Технология" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Text" allDisplayName="Text" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Theme" displayName="Технология" disabled="false" sourceExpression="%cube.GetTech(%source.Text)" list="true" listDelimiter="," useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Author" disabled="false" sharesFrom="TopicAnalytics" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Author" allDisplayName="Author" type="data" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> </dimension> <dimension name="Posted" disabled="false" sharesFrom="TopicAnalytics" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Posted" allDisplayName="Posted" type="data" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> </dimension> <listing name="New_listing1" disabled="false" listingType="table" fieldList="Author,Posted,ExtId,Text,Link,Topic->Name,Topic->Updated,Topic->Views"> </listing> </cube>

Method.name: GetTech
Method.Implementation:
s text=$zconvert(text,"l") s res="" #define addtech(%tstr,%tech) if $F(text,%tstr) s $p(res,",",$I(i))=%tech w res,!
$$$addtech("cach","Cache") $$$addtech("ensemble","Ensemble") $$$addtech("iknow","iKnow") $$$addtech("deepsee","DeepSee") $$$addtech("gt.m","GT.M") if res="" s res="Другое" q res
